Room.Name: The Orange Training Hut
Room.ShortDescription: You have successfully defeated the Barbarian, and proven your worth as a Grunt, First Class. Your barbarian brothers applaude your victory.
Room.LongDescription: As you probably now know, barbarians don't let their kind advance without making sure that they earn the title they are planning to advance to. Now that you have defeated the grunt, first class, you are now allowed to train to that class rank. Unfortunately, as a grunt, first class, your skills have exceeded the skills being taught at this section of the Barbarian Pits, and you must now search for the Tribesman Training Huts.
